tool_description: Cleans and normalizes customer feedback text by removing noise, standardizing formats, and preparing text for sentiment analysis.

text.description: Raw customer feedback text to be preprocessed

normalize_case.description: Whether to convert text to lowercase

error_messages: Empty text input: Provide non-empty text string for preprocessing.
Text too long: Input text must be under 10,000 characters.
Invalid encoding: Text must be valid UTF-8 encoded string.
usage: Provide raw customer feedback text. Optionally configure stopword removal and case normalization. Returns cleaned text ready for analysis.

word_count.description: Number of words in cleaned text

removed_elements.description: Types of elements removed during preprocessing
